document.full_text: ollanta humala's rapid climb in the polls ahead of the sunday elections has highlighted an apparent paradox in which peru's booming economy masks deep discontent with its politics.
document.title: ex-military officer jolts peru presidential race
lines_and_colors: ollanta humala's rapid climb in the polls ahead of the sunday elections has highlighted an apparent paradox in which peru's booming economy masks deep discontent with its politics.
